system.description:
You never really were on the fellowship's side.

REQUIREMENTS

To become The Traitor, you have joined the Empire, or perhaps you were working for them all along. You cannot be The Traitor in a game without the Empire.

The Traitor starts with the Move The Bad Guy.

Important: Traitor Moves cannot be taken by Powerful Playbooks, even ones that can take any Destiny Move.

@UUID[Compendium.fellowship-pbta.in-rebellion-dpb-traitor.Item.uxcLF0JWOSRNHTBn]{THE BAD GUY}
